info.name: Stalk
info.author: Kio
info.description: Find out all about a user!

info.name: Ban
info.author: Kio
info.description: Use this command to ban others!

ban.cant_ban_others: You're not someone who should be banning others! ><
ban.cant_ban_kiru: Using me to ban myself is not nice!
ban.cant_ban_owner: You can't ban the owner of this server!
ban.cant_ban_higher_than_kiru: I can't ban {username} because they're higher than me in the hierarchy.
ban.cant_ban_higher_than_user: I can't ban {username} because they're higher than you in the hierarchy.
ban.banedmembers: I succefully banned {amount} users. That's a lot... >~<

info.name: Kick
info.author: Kio
info.description: Use this command to kick others!

kick.cant_kick_others: You're not someone who should be kicking others! ><
kick.cant_kick_kiru: Using me to kick myself is not nice!
kick.cant_kick_owner: You can't kick the owner of this server!
kick.cant_kick_higher_than_kiru: I can't kick {username} because they're higher than me in the hierarchy.
kick.cant_kick_higher_than_user: I can't kick {username} because they're higher than you in the hierarchy.
kick.kickedmembers: I succefully kicked {amount} users. That's a lot... >~<

say.no_responsibility: Team Kiru doesn't take responsibility for this message!
